name: Large Cooler Bag-Bike
description:
Large Cooler Bag by SoYoung
  • PVC and phthalate free
  • Coated linen exterior with fully insulated lining
  • Detachable long strap for wearing as a messenger bag or backpack
  • Adjustable carrying handle allows cooler bag to be secured to another bag or hung from a stroller
  • Extra mesh back pocket
  • Care: wipe clean exterior, wash interior with warm soapy water. Do not machine wash or dry.
  • Dimensions: 5" x 8" x 8.5"

name: Kids Konserve Nesting Trio
description:
Nesting Trio by Kids Konserve
  • Leak-proof stainless steel nesting trio containers are the perfect solution for all of your lunch-packing needs, and they nest inside one another to save on storage space.
  • Large: 16oz = 4.75" x 2.25 "
  • Medium: 8oz = 4"x2"
  • Small: 5oz = 3.5" x 1.5"

name: Baby Bum Balm-60g
description:
Baby Bum Balm by All Things Jill
  • The BEST bum balm around! Soothing and safe, it help baby's bum feel wonderful. Tested and loved by cloth diapering parents, this soothing balm is also fantastic for cradle cap, and dry skin!
  • 100% Natural, proudly made in Alberta, Canada
  • Ingredients: Olive Oil, Sunflower Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Apricot Kernel Oil, ALberta Beeswax, Jojoba oil, Calendula flowers, Chamomile flowers, Lavender buds, Rose flowers, Vitamin E, Calendula flower extract, Lavender oil, Rosemary leaf extract.
  • Available in 60g tub

name: Home Birth Kit
description:
Home Birth Kit by Natural Creation
  • Includes: 2x waterproof sheets (42"x84") 1x perineal bottle 1x deluxe cold compress 1x white garbage bag 8x under pads 23"x36" 18x under pads 17"x24" 24x heavy flow menstrual pads 1x black garbage bag 1x white baby cap

name: LunchBots Uno All Stainless
description:
All Stainless Uno Container by LunchBots
  • A favourite container for parents and kids on the go! LunchBots Uno Stainless Steel Food containers are the perfect size for almost every lunch option you can think up. Their retro look makes food fun and appetizing, encouraging finicky eaters to finish every last bite!
  • One compartment
  • No linings, no toxins- only food grade stainless steel (18/8) comes in to contact with your food
  • Easy to clean, and incredibly durable
  • Best for dry foods as they are not water tight
  • Easy lid for little hands
  • 6" x 5" x 1.75"

name: LunchBots Uno Blue
description:
Blue Uno Container by LunchBots
  • A favourite container for parents and kids on the go! LunchBots Uno Stainless Steel Food containers are the perfect size for almost every lunch option you can think up. Their retro look makes food fun and appetizing, encouraging finicky eaters to finish every last bite!
  • One compartment
  • No linings, no toxins- only food grade stainless steel (18/8) comes in to contact with your food
  • Easy to clean, and incredibly durable
  • Best for dry foods as they are not water tight
  • Easy lid for little hands
  • 6" x 5" x 1.75"

name: LunchBots Duo-Pink
description:
Pink Duo Container by LunchBots
  • Ideal for sides and snacks, the LunchBots Duo is a great companion for any lunch. Whatever you pack, even picky eaters will find lunch more appetizing!
  • Two compartments. Handy divider allows any combination you choose.
  • No linings, no toxins- only food grade stainless steel (18/8) comes in to contact with your food
  • Easy to clean, and incredibly durable.
  • Best for dry foods as they are not water tight
  • Easy lid for little hands
  • 6" x 5" x 1.75"

name: LunchBots Duo-Orange
description:
Orange Duo Container by LunchBots
  • Ideal for sides and snacks, the LunchBots Duo is a great companion for any lunch. Whatever you pack, even picky eaters will find lunch more appetizing!
  • Two compartments. Handy divider allows any combination you choose.
  • No linings, no toxins- only food grade stainless steel (18/8) comes in to contact with your food
  • Easy to clean, and incredibly durable.
  • Best for dry foods as they are not water tight
  • Easy lid for little hands
  • 6" x 5" x 1.75"

name: Abeego Flats
description:
Abeego Flats
  • The original reusable food storage and the ideal kitchen companion! Bend and shape to suit your food storage needs. Simply press and form over dishes to cover leftovers, wrap up cheese, form around produce, baked goods and more!
  • Handcrafted with an authentic blend of beeswax, tree resin and jojoba oil infused into fabric made of hemp and cotton.
  • Includes 3 sizes: Small (7"x7"), Medium (10"x10") & Large (13"x13")

name: Abeego Snack
description:
Abeego Snack
  • This reusable snack wrap is perfect for vegetables, nuts, fruit, granola and more. The fluid and air resistant beeswax coating keeps food fresh and delicious.
  • Holds approximately a 3/4 cup snack serving, and is designed to lay flat for easy cleaning.
  • Handcrafted with an authentic blend of beeswax, tree resin and jojoba oil infused into fabric made of hemp and cotton.
  • Choose from red, green, blue or purple stitching

name: Abeego Wrap
description:
Abeego Wrap
  • This reusable food wrap is great for sandwiches, wraps, vegetables and more. Simply place lunch in the center, bring right and left sides together and roll down. Flip bottom, and top and secure
  • The fluid and air resistant beeswax coating keeps food fresh and it's easy to clean
  • Handcrafted with an authentic blend of beeswax, tree resin and jojoba oil infused into fabric made of hemp and cotton.
  • Choose from red, green, blue or purple stitching

name: Baby Bum Balm-120g
description:
Baby Bum Balm by All Things Jill
  • The BEST bum balm around! Soothing and safe, it help baby's bum feel wonderful. Tested and loved by cloth diapering parents, this soothing balm is also fantastic for cradle cap, and dry skin!
  • 100% Natural, proudly made in Alberta, Canada
  • Ingredients: Olive Oil, Sunflower Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Apricot Kernel Oil, ALberta Beeswax, Jojoba oil, Calendula flowers, Chamomile flowers, Lavender buds, Rose flowers, Vitamin E, Calendula flower extract, Lavender oil, Rosemary leaf extract.
  • 120g tub

name: Cuppow
description:
Wide Mouth or Regular Cuppow
  • The convenient and easy to use adapter transforms any canning jar into a travel mug.
  • Easy to clean, cheap and durable. Just add Mason Jar and Band/Ring. Use any regular sized mason jar with 2 3/4" diameter thread.
  • Made in the U.S.
  • BPA Free
  • Available in Wide Mouth (3.5") or Regular (2.5") with Straw-Tek
  • Straw-Tek is designed to fit straws 6mm or less. The redesigned spout section makes it easier for smaller mouths and kids!

name: Oh! Baby Body Lotion
description:
Oh! Baby Body Lotion by All Things Jill
  • Relieves dryness and helps keep baby's skin "oh-so-soft". Best when applied after bath time!
  • 100% Natural, proudly made in Alberta, Canada
  • Ingredients: Aqua, Helianthus annuus (Sunflower) Oil*, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter*, Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Oil*, Lecithin*, Palm Stearic Acid, Emulsifying Wax NF, Cetyl Alcohol, Vegetable Glycerine, Silver Citrate, Citric Acid, Lavandula officinalis (Lavender) Oil*. * = certified organic
  • Vegan/Never tested on animals
    • 125ml

name: Organic Cotton Washcloths-5pk
description:
Organic Cotton Washcloths by All Things Jill
  • Super soft and absorbent, these organic cotton washcloths are a must for every change table.
  • 8" x 8"- folded in half, they fit perfectly into a wipes case or change purse for the mom on-the-go
  • Made in Canada

name: Scrub-a-Dub Lavender Soap
description:
Scrub-a-Dub Lavender Soap by All Things Jill
  • A simple clean bar for tender skin. Long lasting, safe with gentle, soft suds.
  • Ingredients: Olea europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cocos nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Elaeis guineensis (Palm) Kernel Oil, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) Oil*. * = organic
  • 100% Natural, Vegan, Never tested on animals
  • 120 g bar

name: Organic Body Wash + Shampoo
description:
Organic Body Wash + Shampoo by All Things Jill
  • Use this pure and gentle foaming wash + shampoo for bathing babies and children. This is not a "no-tear" formula, so please use extra care around eyes! This gentle wash contains no petrochemical or synthetic surfactants or foaming agents. Because of this, it is packaged in a self-foaming bottle to properly dispense and foam your wash
  • Ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Olea europaea Olive) Fruit Oil*, Cocos nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Lavandula officinalis (Lavender) Oil*. * = certified organic

name: Handmade Wooden Eggs
description:
Handmade Wooden Eggs by Camden Rose
  • Made in USA
  • Includes 6 Grade A Large birch eggs and a recycled paper carton
  • Recommended for ages 2 and up.

name: Horny Toad Chaka Skirt
description:
Chaka Skirt by Horny Toad
  • Our best-selling skirt of all time, because it's just that good. Flattering for any body type, ultra-comfortable and completely versatile.
  • Featuring a wide, ruched elasticized waistband with an inner pocket. A-line silhouette.
  • 48" Tencel, 48% Organic Cotton, 4% Spandex
  • Available in Bottle Green and Black

name: Horny Toad Dresspass
description:
Dresspass by Horny Toad
  • The plush Dresspass is just right for when you need to look pulled together too!
  • Curved princess seams give this dress its a flattering edge, while the front pockets and hood add a perfect amount of coziness. Pair with boots and leggings the perfect fall look
  • 100% Organic Cotton

name: Horny Toad Eclair Sweater
description:
Eclair Sweater by Horny Toad
  • Featuring an asymmetric crossover neckline and two-colour rib-knit trim at the collar, cuffs and hem are the cherry on top.
  • Low maintenance wonder-wool that's itchhless and machine washable, and so soft that wearing it next to the skin is pleasure!
  • 100% Merino wool

name: Horny Toad Coriander Skirt
description:
Coriander Skirt by Horny Toad
  • Velvety and soft, this mid-wale cord has been cross-dyed for visual depth, yet maintains a traditional corduroy texture. Spices up leggings or boots like nobody's business!
  • Featuring zip fly with button closure, front pockets with metal rivets and back patch pockets
  • 64% Organic Cotton, 34% Polyester, 2% Spandex
  • Available in blue steel

name: Horny Toad Checkov Pant
description:
Checkov Pant by Horny Toad
  • Featuring the simple, clean lines of a well designed chino and the ease of your favourite pair of jeans.
  • Straight leg
  • 50% Cotton, 49% Organic Cotton, 1% Spandex

name: Horny Toad Delilah Dress
description:
Delilah by Horny Toad
  • Featuring a button boatneck collar, pockets and a scallop detail at the cuffs and hem, the Delilah is one step above an ordinary sweater dress, yet still maintains all the comfort and ease.
  • 40% Modal, 35% Polyester, 25% Organic Cotton
  • Available in Ruby, Bright Navy and Nightshade

name: Horny Toad Lean Leggings
description:
Lean Leggings by Horny Toad
  • Deliciously lightweight and super-comfortable, the lean legging is a natural companion to any short dress, tunic or long shirt.
  • Sleek fit through the legs with a gusseted crotch and cool flatlock stitching slate them for a favourite status among your basics.
  • Available in smoke

name: Horny Toad Nixi Skirt
description:
Nixi Skirt by Horny Toad
  • There's only one reason designers repeat styles- because they work. The Nixi skirt is back, and we're so glad it is. The simplicity of this skirt makes it a great style for a range of body types, and is the perfect layering piece as the weather cools down. And pockets too? What's not to love!
  • 59% Tencel, 26% Organic Cotton, 13% Polyester, 2% Spandex

name: Horny Toad Stripe Out Boat Tee
description:
Stripe Out Boat Tee by Horny Toad
  • Who doesn't love stripes? As wearable at the regatta as it is an early morning hike with your favourite pooch.
  • Features contrasting cuffs and a twisted slouch collar for an extra touch under a jacket.
  • 100% Organic Cotton
  • Available in Navy or Smoke

name: Horny Toad Rosalinda Dress
description:
Rosalinda Dress by Horny Toad
  • With a comfy, complimentary shape, the Rosalinda Dress will quickly become a wardrobe favourite.
  • Featuring a v-neck, horizontal bust pleats, double-layer empire bodice, three quarter sleeves and an A-line drape to the knee. Amazing work-to-play adaptability.
  • Available in black and deep ruby

name: Horny Toad Rollick Crew
description:
Rollick Crew by Horny Toad
  • This wide scoop neck tee has full length sleeves and a flattering fit. Great for everyday wear.
  • Featuring a double raw edge around the neckline and cuffs, and a pretty floral print.
  • 48" Tencel, 48% Organic Cotton, 4% Spandex
  • Available in Blue, Boulder Grey or Spearmint

name: Horny Toad Highroad Pant
description:
Highroad Pant by Horny Toad
  • Classy and casual, you're sure to love these soft twill pants.
  • Narrow straight leg
  • 77% Organic Cotton, 21% Polyester, 2% Spandex

name: Horny Toad Unveil Scarf
description:
Unveil Scarf by Horny Toad
  • REGULAR PRICE $49
  • Versatile and lightweight. Wear as a sarong, scarf or shawl.
  • 45"wide by 60" long
  • 100% Organic Cotton
  • Available in bright coral

name: Horny Toad Walkon Short
description:
Walkon Short by Horny Toad
  • REGULAR PRICE $75
  • Comfy, organic cotton blend with durable, quick-drying recycled poly and a touch of stretchy spandex.
  • Zip fly, button closure, drop-in front welt pockets, button flap back pockets and 9" inseam
  • 80% Organic Cotton, 17% Recycled Polyester, 3% Spandex

name: Small Round Container
description:
Small Round Container by Kids Konserve
  • #304 (18/8) food grade, leak-proof stainless steel containers. The perfect size for smaller snacks- like nuts! Also handy for sauces or dressings.
  • Sold individually
  • 5oz, 3.5" wide x 1.5" tall

name: Ice Pack & Sweat-Free Cover
description:
Ice Pack by Kids Konserve
  • Made from recycled plastic bottles, the duo fits perfectly on the bottom of your lunch bag. Pop in the freezer, place in your lunch sack, and it will keep your lunch cold for hours.
  • Cover is machine washable. Works best when gel pack is kept inside sweat-free cover when freezing.
  • Cover is made from 100% non-toxic recycled PET #1 plastic bottles, Gel pack is a non-toxic sodium polymer
  • 7" x 5" x .75"

name: Rectangle Container (Slate)
description:
Rectangle Stainless Steel Container by U-Konserve
  • It's finally here! A leak-proof, rectangle, stainless steel container! Perfect for sandwiches, wraps, sushi, salads- you name it! Also use it for take out, and to store your leftovers in the fridge.
  • Container is made of #304 (18/8) food-grade stainless steel. Lids are made of non-toxic LDPE #4 plastic. Free of BPA, phthalates, PVC and lead!
  • 7.75" L x 5" W x 1.75" H

name: Rectangle Container (Yellow)
description:
Rectangle Stainless Steel Container by U-Konserve
  • It's finally here! A leak-proof, rectangle, stainless steel container! Perfect for sandwiches, wraps, sushi, salads- you name it! Also use it for take out, and to store your leftovers in the fridge.
  • Container is made of #304 (18/8) food-grade stainless steel. Lids are made of non-toxic LDPE #4 plastic. Free of BPA, phthalates, PVC and lead!
  • 7.75" L x 5" W x 1.75" H

name: Reusable Snack Pouch-Small
description:
Reusable Snack Pouch-Large
  • Never use a plastic sandwich baggie again! These reusable snack bags are perfect for any lunch!
  • Machine washable and dryer (low) friendly
  • FDA approved, BPA, lead and nickel free
  • Proudly made in Canada
  • 5.5"x4"

description:
Reusable Snack Pouch-Large
  • Never use a plastic sandwich baggie again! These reusable snack bags are perfect for any lunch!
